title: Test
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average living space in square meters per person, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Average living space in square meters per person has increased over the Year.
Average living space in square meters per person is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2012.
Max Average living space in square meters per person about 13.3 was recorded at Year 2018, and 2019
Min Average living space in square meters per person about 12.2 was recorded at Year 2007
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average living space in square meters per person, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2007 to 2018.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2018 to 2019.
